Title: Asphalt Man/Asphalt Sa-na-yi (Ah seu pal teu Sa na yi)/The Man on the Asphalt/The Dream Racers/The Man from the Asphalt Street(1995)


Episodes: 16
Broadcast network: SBS
Broadcast period: 1995-May-17 to 1995-Jul-06
Director: Lee Jang Soo
Original writing: Hu Young Man
Screenwriter: Park Hyun Joo

Cast:
Byeng-hun Lee
Jin-shil Choi
Woo-sung Jung
Yeong-ae Lee


PLOT:
Living with a single parent family Kang Dong Joon (Lee Byung Hun) & Kang Joon Suk (Jung Woo Sung) are 2 brothers who have a mad love & obsession with cars. Kang Dong Joon is an excel student, & gets a scholarship to a prestige University, he is always favoured by his father & keep him in high regards that he is the son who will excel out of the Korean slum. After graduating he enters SeRyu Motor Company. There is he became a very successful car designer. In the company he meets with another excellent & beautiful designer Hwa Ryun.

Meanwhile Kang Joon Suk with very short tempered, always picks up fights & the ended in prison after assaulting someone. When he was release he finds that his eldest sister, Kang Dong Hui has died of an accidental death. Kang Song Hui feels to the US after conceiving a child with a US Army soldier. Sadden by her death in which Kang Dong Suk blames her death on Kang Dong Joon & his father & thus resent greatly with hatred. In the States, for the sake of taking care his sister's orphan child, Kang Dong Suk raise the child by fighting in illegal boxing fights

After many years passing, the brother met in a testing circuit, where now Kang Dong Suk is an elite test driver. Kang Dong Joon, a now successful car designer want to test drive his car in the Siberia rally & need an experience driver. Will the brothers come together to realise their dream that they had chased for so long or will it become a vendetta.
